Attack Potion: Add 1 of 3 random Attack cards to your hand, it costs 0 Energy this turn.
Blessing of the Forge: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.
Blood Potion: Heal for 20% of your Max HP.
Colorless Potion: Choose 1 of 3 random Colorless cards to add to your hand, it costs 0 Energy this turn.
Cunning Potion: Add 3 Upgraded Shivs to your hand.
Distilled Chaos: Play the top 3 cards of your draw pile.
Duplication Potion: This turn, your next card is played twice.
Elixir: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.
Entropic Brew: Fill all your empty potion slots with random potions.
Essence of Darkness: Channel 1 Dark Dark Orbs for each orb slot.
Fairy in a Bottle: When you would die, heal to 30% of your Max HP instead and discard this potion.
Flex Potion: Gain 5 Strength. At the end of your turn, lose 5 Strength.
Gambler's Brew: Discard any number of cards, then draw that many.
Liquid Memories: Choose a card in your discard pile and return it to your hand. It costs 0 Energy this turn.
Power Potion: Add 1 of 3 random Power cards to your hand, it costs 0 Energy this turn.
Skill Potion: Add 1 of 3 random Skill cards to your hand, it costs 0 Energy this turn.
Smoke Bomb: Escape from a non-boss combat. Receive no rewards.
Snecko Oil: Draw 5 cards. Randomize the costs of all cards in your hand for the rest of the combat.
Speed Potion: Gain 5 Dexterity. At the end of your turn, lose 5 Dexterity.
